commandParser
Class Command

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--commandParser.Command
Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckInCommand, CheckMessagesCommand, CheckOutCommand, CheckTransfersCommand, HoldCommand, LoginCommand, LookupCommand, QuitCommand, ShowHoldsCommand, TransferBookCommand
public abstract class Command
extends java.lang.Object

Version:
20040405 This is a base class to commands in the command parser. A command has a name and zero or more named parameters. = = A value can be a quoted string. Early Restrictions: (FIX) - no prompting in commands - no quoted strings for multiple word titles or authors
Author:
Chris Roeder

commandFactory

public static Command commandFactory(java.lang.String s,
                                     CommandProcessor cp,
                                     library.Catalog catalog,
                                     java.util.HashMap users,
                                     library.CardHolder ch)
Creates a command object based on the command name.

Parameters:
s - the command line, must start with the command name.
Returns:
returns a new Command object of the apropriate class (based on the command name)
